projects.title: YouTube Shorts Automation
projects.description: An automated content generation system leveraging Groq API with LLaMA model for script creation and Reddit API for trending topics. Features video processing with MoviePy, text-to-speech via gTTS, and Pexels API integration. Implements GitHub Actions for scheduling and YouTube Data API v3 for uploads, with robust error handling using tenacity and loguru.

projects.title: Daily News Update
projects.description: A real-time dashboard aggregating trending content from multiple platforms with a focus on Indian trends, featuring hourly updates, detailed trend analysis, and responsive design for seamless cross-device access.

projects.title: Nokia Snake Game
projects.description: A nostalgic recreation of the classic Nokia Snake game from the 90s, featuring authentic pixel-perfect movement, score tracking, and the iconic green LCD display aesthetic.
